name: Mars: War Logs — an interactive fiction retelling
name_original: Mars: War Logs — an interactive fiction retelling
description:
Innocence Smith, a young Auroran, is brought into the POW camp of Abundance. There, he meets someone different. The meeting will change lives.

---

A fan retelling of Mars: War Logs, a game by Spiders studio. Originall posted on AO3 on 11 Sept 2021.
